item.title: How to climb up ladders? stairs? etc?
item.dc:creator: @imtiax imtiax
item.description:
@imtiax wrote:

well first of all make ur self a root admin of the server if u already hadent

then go to the ladder and type ::oadd then click on the ladder 2 times then tele to the next ladder then click on that ladder 2 times.

THEN TYPE ::ODUMP

WARNING DO NOT CLICK ON ANY OTHER ITEMS OR ANYTHING OR WEN U CLIME UP THAT LADDER IT WILL TAKE U THERE.

THIS DEPENDS ON THE SOURCE U R USING BUT OWRKS FOR MOST SOURCES

Read full topic
